summary: This is a testing purpose mod and is still wip, Of course there are not bugs with the places as enemies are not added yet and if someone wants to see the first place, type in your console player.moveto 02004661 because there are no connections to Skyrim yet.
descriptionHtml:
It\'s only a WIP file for beta testing. No need to download it. But if someone wants to see the first place, type in your console player.moveto 02004661, there are no connections to Skyrim yet.

Now a Baljhet Mountains version is available for testing purposes. You can type in the console player.coc CVNAbCaBossRoom to teleport to the first boss battle room and then go to Baljhet Mountains from the elevator. If you don\'t want to do the boss battle again you can type killall once inside the room with Crazy Armor.

To test the new version properly, deactivate the old beta test or the castlevania demo version and most of your mods if you experience crashes and slow game.
author: LordKarnak
